import Mathlib.Data.Real.EReal
import Mathlib.Analysis.InnerProductSpace.Basic
import Mathlib.MeasureTheory.Integral.Bochner

open scoped RealInnerProductSpace
open Finset ENNReal NNReal BigOperators MeasureTheory

local macro_rules | `($x ^ $y) => `(HPow.hPow $x $y)

set_option trace.Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite true

variable [NormedAddCommGroup ((Vector â„ d) â†’ â„)] [InnerProductSpace â„ ((Vector â„ d) â†’ â„)]
variable [NormedAddCommGroup (â„• â†’ (Vector â„ d) â†’ â„)] [InnerProductSpace â„ (â„• â†’ (Vector â„ d) â†’ â„)] [MeasurableSpace (Vector â„ d)]

/--
  a*a = aÂ²
-/
lemma square {M : Type _} [Monoid M] (a : M) : a * a = a^2 := (sq a).symm

/--
  aÂ² * bÂ² = (a * b)Â²
-/
lemma distrib_sq {M : Type _} [CommMonoid M] (a b : M) : a^2 * b^2 = (a * b)^2 := (mul_pow a b 2).symm
/--
  âˆ€ a b âˆˆ â„âº âˆª {âˆ}, a â‰¤ b â†’ aÂ² â‰¤ bÂ²
-/
lemma le_square {a b : â„â‰¥0âˆ} (h : a â‰¤ b) : a^2 â‰¤ b^2 :=

lemma coe_nnreal_le {a b : â„â‰¥0} (h : a â‰¤ b) : (a : â„â‰¥0âˆ) â‰¤ (b : â„â‰¥0âˆ) := Iff.mpr coe_le_coe h

(range (d + 1)).Nonempty
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.nonempty_range_iff:1000, (Finset.range (d + 1)).Nonempty ==> d + 1 â‰  0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @ne_eq:1000, d + 1 â‰  0 ==> Â¬d + 1 = 0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @add_eq_zero:1000, d + 1 = 0 ==> d = 0 âˆ§ 1 = 0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @one_ne_zero:1000, 1 = 0 ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] and_false:1000, d = 0 âˆ§ False ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_false_eq_true:1000, Â¬False ==> True
Goals accomplished! ğŸ™

/-ASSUMED LEMMAS-/
/--
  Linearity of inner product applied to integral
-/
lemma 
Warning: declaration uses 'sorry'
 (Î¼ : Measure (Vector â„ d)) (g : (Vector â„ d) â†’ â„) (f : (Vector â„ d) â†’ (Vector â„ d) â†’ â„) : âŸªg, (fun x â†¦ (âˆ« y, f y x âˆ‚Î¼))âŸ« = âˆ« y, âŸªg, f yâŸ« âˆ‚Î¼ :=

Goals accomplished! ğŸ™
d: â„•
instâœâ´: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœÂ³: InnerProductSpace â„ (Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœÂ²: NormedAddCommGroup (â„• â†’ Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœÂ¹: InnerProductSpace â„ (â„• â†’ Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœ: MeasurableSpace (Vector â„ d)
Î¼: Measure (Vector â„ d)
g: Vector â„ d â†’ â„
f: Vector â„ d â†’ Vector â„ d â†’ â„

/--
  Linearity of inner product for function
-/
lemma 
Warning: declaration uses 'sorry'
 (f a b : Vector â„ d â†’ â„) (c : â„) : âŸªf, fun x â†¦ c * a x + b xâŸ« = c * âŸªf, fun x â†¦ a xâŸ« + âŸªf, fun x â†¦ b xâŸ« := 
Goals accomplished! ğŸ™
d: â„•
instâœâ´: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœÂ³: InnerProductSpace â„ (Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœÂ²: NormedAddCommGroup (â„• â†’ Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœÂ¹: InnerProductSpace â„ (â„• â†’ Vector â„ d â†’ â„)
instâœ: MeasurableSpace (Vector â„ d)

c: â„
âŸªf, fun x => c * a x + b xâŸ«_â„ = c * âŸªf, fun x => a xâŸ«_â„ + âŸªf, fun x => b xâŸ«_â„

/--
  âŸªf, âˆ‡k(x, Ì‡)âŸ« = âˆ‡f(x)
-/
lemma 
Warning: declaration uses 'sorry'
 (Hâ‚€ : Set ((Vector â„ d) â†’ â„)) (dk : Vector â„ d â†’ â„• â†’ Vector â„ d â†’ â„) (f : (Vector â„ d) â†’ â„) (df' : â„• â†’ (Vector â„ d) â†’ â„) (hf : f âˆˆ Hâ‚€) : âˆ€x, âˆ€ i âˆˆ range (d + 1), âŸªf, dk x iâŸ« = df' i x :=

Goals accomplished! ğŸ™

  -- See Theorem 1 of *Derivative reproducing properties for kernel methods in learning theory, Zhou 2008*.

/--
  Linearity of inner product for function
-/
lemma 
Warning: declaration uses 'sorry'
 (f a b : â„• â†’ Vector â„ d â†’ â„) (c : â„) : âŸªfun i x â†¦ c * a i x + b i x, fâŸ« = c * âŸªfun i x â†¦ a i x, fâŸ« + âŸªfun i x â†¦ b i x, fâŸ« :=

d: â„•

/-==============-/


/- Def of â„â‰¥0âˆ coerced log. -/
noncomputable def log (a : â„â‰¥0âˆ) := Real.log (ENNReal.toReal a)

noncomputable def KL {Î± : Type _} [MeasurableSpace Î±] (Î¼ : Measure Î±) (dÎ¼ dÏ€ : Î± â†’ â„â‰¥0âˆ) := ENNReal.ofReal (âˆ« x in Set.univ, log ((dÎ¼ x) / (dÏ€ x)) âˆ‚Î¼)

/--
  Definition of infinite limit at infinity for vector-valued function (we use the order of real numbers on the norm of vectors as an order on â„áµˆ).
-/
def tends_to_infty {Î± : Type _} [Norm Î±] (f : Î± â†’ â„) := âˆ€ c > 0, âˆƒ (x : Î±), âˆ€ (x':Î±), â€–xâ€– â‰¤ â€–x'â€– â†’ c < f x
variable [Norm (Vector â„ d)]
/--
  Unformal but highly pratical multivariate integration by parts.
-/
theorem

/--
  Definition of limit at infinity for positive real-valued function. Used in KSD.lean
-/
def limit (f : â„â‰¥0 â†’ â„â‰¥0âˆ) (l : â„â‰¥0âˆ) := âˆ€Îµ, 0 < Îµ â†’ âˆƒX, âˆ€x, X â‰¤ x â†’ |f x - l| < Îµ

f, g: â„â‰¥0 â†’ â„â‰¥0âˆ
decreasing: âˆ€ (x y : â„â‰¥0), x < y â†’ f y â‰¤ f x
hf_nn: âˆ€ (x : â„â‰¥0), f x â‰  0

Î³: â„â‰¥0âˆ
hg: âˆ€ (x : â„â‰¥0), Î³ < g x
t: â„â‰¥0
h: f t â‰¤ f 0
f_le: g t / (2 * f 0) â‰¤ g t / (2 * f t)
2 * f 0 â‰  0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @ne_eq:1000, f 0 + f 0 â‰  0 ==> Â¬f 0 + f 0 = 0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @add_eq_zero:1000, f 0 + f 0 = 0 ==> f 0 = 0 âˆ§ f 0 = 0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] and_self:1000, f 0 = 0 âˆ§ f 0 = 0 ==> f 0 = 0
d: â„•

hg: âˆ€ (x : â„â‰¥0), Î³ < g x

-- Under some non-zero and finite conditions, a â‰¤ (1 / (2 * c)) * b â†’ - (b : â„) â‰¤ -2 * (c : â„) * (a : â„)

ttâœ: (a * (2 * c)).toReal = a.toReal * (2 * c).toReal
tt: (2 * c).toReal = 2.toReal * c.toReal
